title: Shorts: Woody Tasch of Slow Money
subtitle: Shorts: Woody Tasch of Slow Money
summary:
Woody Tasch is an environmentally responsible financier. He worked for over 30 years in finance, managing other people’s money but ten years ago he took a radical step and started the Slow Money movement.Slow Money walks a fine line between philanthropy and investment - the return on an investment is the regeneration of the soil and, ultimately, the the health of the local community and planet.

This is a full length interview with Woody that we featured in Episode 44

Interview by Abby Rose and Editing by Suzie McCarthy for Farmerama
